description:
## Directory Crop - Quickly crop images in directory

![Screenshot of Directory Crop](https://www.japplis.com/directory-crop/images/directory-crop-screenshot.png)

Directory Crop lets you quickly select the best images from a directory by either deleting bad ones or cropping the best part of ok images.
        Deleting, cropping or navigating the images can be done from the mouse.
        Directory Crop is ideal for getting the best of your generated AI images like from Stable Diffusion for example to remove extra arms or badly generated hands.
      Fremium: 100 crops per month free, then a watermark is applied to the image.
author: Japplis
